title: Building Butcher’s Bridge: the Bilgewater event

this is so cool !
omg we need a pirate announcer that narrate our PENTAKILLS

FFS i can sea where this is going

These puns are not Neseasarry.
OMFG i cant stop laughing cause of these Hilarious Puns
well no more puns guess the tide has turned
Logged to upvote this!!!
You sir, just made my day. Best pun OCE.

"TLDR: Later this summer, we’ll launch our next event"

Funny that, in OCE summer isn't here for 6 months.

I love how they simply copy and paste the articles and posts from a different continent. It's fine if they do that, but could they please just tidy up the dates in accordance to formats and such for OCE? It would save a lot of people who _may_ get confused by this and would save unnecessary questions.
Well lets be honest Riot doesnt really know about Oceania or really care...
what's oceania? Kappa
Exactly...
ya
So do we get it ours or there summer? like end of next summer who summer RIOT???
Their summer.
that's some bronze spelling
Good point! Changed it to winter. It's so cold right now we should have seen that one.
this looks like howling abyiss.
I wonder why.
